name: pii-redaction
description: Detect and redact personally identifiable information (PII) from text. Supports emails, phone numbers, SSNs, credit cards, IP addresses, and more.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: pii_redaction
toolDefinition.description: Detect and redact PII from text. Identifies emails, phone numbers, SSNs, credit card numbers, IP addresses, dates of birth, and names patterns.

action.description: detect (find PII), redact (replace PII with placeholders), report (detailed analysis)

types.description: Specific PII types to look for (default: all)
